title: Wear Paint App & Sync Mobile
summary: Amazing Paint & Sync App For Wear.Real time broadcasting paint to your mobile.
description: *Simple Paint App For Wear.This app made with simple tools as a start.I will be happy to answer new suggestions.At this moment you can:- Paint with different colors on your wear.- Painting automatically will also display in your mobile.- Save / Share / clear and more.- Real time broadcasting paint to your phone.Please note:- In order to exit application in wear device you need to open settingsand push the exit button.- In order to share or save you must be connected to your phone.- If for any reason app wont install on your wear device / not working please let me know! I will do my best to fix it.
descriptionHTML:
*Simple Paint App For Wear.

This app made with simple tools as a start.
I will be happy to answer new suggestions.
At this moment you can:

- Paint with different colors on your wear.
- Painting automatically will also display in your mobile.
- Save / Share / clear and more.
- Real time broadcasting paint to your phone.

Please note:
- In order to exit application in wear device you need to open settings
and push the exit button.
- In order to share or save you must be connected to your phone.
- If for any reason app wont install on your wear device / not working please let me know!
I will do my best to fix it.
comments: Problem with LG G Watch Only the first 3 settings icons are displayed, the rest are below the screen  Making exit hard!
